form.name: acute_ear_infection_two
form.page_subtitle: CWC Diagnostic: Ear Problems> Acute Ear Infection Two

field.name: Administer ONE dose of paracetamol in clinic if temperature ≥ 38.5°C
Teach mother/caregiver to dry the ear by wicking
If ear discharge is present, check for HIV infection if trained
Complete assessment of child, and administer all appropriate treatment
Counsel mother/caregiver on feeding a sick child
Advise mother/caregiver to return for a follow-up visit in 5 days
Record clinical care in Child Health Record “green” book
